briefdescription.para: Construct an emulator component of the given type.

memberdef.argsstring: (MPI_Comm comm, int comp_id, const char *input_file, int run_type, int start_ymd, int start_tod)
memberdef.name: create_instance

detaileddescription.para: Initialize the component instance with MPI and metadata.
Sets up MPI communicator, stores component metadata, and prepares for grid data and coupling setup.

parameterdescription.para: Component ID assigned by the driver
Start time of day in seconds

memberdef.argsstring: (int nx, int ny, int num_local_cols, int num_global_cols, const int *col_gids, const double *lat, const double *lon, const double *area)
memberdef.name: set_grid_data

briefdescription.para: Set grid decomposition data from the driver.

detaileddescription.para: Override grid data with values from Fortran driver.
Receives the local portion of the global grid as distributed by the E3SM driver's domain decomposition.

nx
Number of grid points in x-direction (longitude)
ny
Number of grid points in y-direction (latitude)
num_local_cols
Number of columns on this MPI rank
num_global_cols
Total number of columns globally
col_gids
Global IDs for each local column
lat
Latitude values for each local column [radians]
lon
Longitude values for each local column [radians]
area
Grid cell areas for each local column [km²]
Used when the driver provides grid decomposition directly instead of reading from a file.

memberdef.argsstring: (double *import_data, double *export_data, int num_imports, int num_exports, int field_size)
memberdef.name: setup_coupling

detaileddescription.para: Set up coupling buffer pointers from the MCT layer.
Receives pointers to the MCT attribute vector buffers for data exchange with other components via the coupler.

parameterdescription.para: Size of each field (should equal num_local_cols)

detaileddescription.para: Initialize the component by calling the derived class implementation.
Called after grid and coupling setup. Loads AI model, reads initial conditions, and prepares for time stepping.
Execute one time step: import → run → export.

briefdescription.para: Finalize and clean up the component.

detaileddescription.para: Finalize the component and release resources.
Releases resources, finalizes inference backend, and performs any necessary cleanup.

briefdescription.para: Get number of columns on this MPI rank.
Get total number of columns globally.
Get number of grid points in x-direction (longitude).
Get number of grid points in y-direction (latitude).
Get global IDs for local columns.

parameterdescription.para: Output array (must be pre-allocated with num_local_cols)

briefdescription.para: Get MPI rank within component communicator.
Check if this is the root rank (rank 0).
Run AI inference on packed input/output vectors.

parameterdescription.para: Packed output features (will be resized as needed)

briefdescription.para: Import fields from coupler (override as needed).
Export fields to coupler (override as needed).
Read grid information from the configuration and grid files.

detaileddescription.para: Parses the YAML configuration to find the grid file path, then reads grid dimensions and coordinates using PIO.

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::vector< double > &lon_global, const std::vector< double > &lat_global, const std::vector< double > &area_global)
memberdef.name: distribute_grid_data

briefdescription.para: Distribute global grid data to local partitions.

detaileddescription.para: Performs a simple 1D decomposition across MPI ranks, assigning contiguous blocks of columns to each rank.

briefdescription.para: Set up a default 360x180 global grid.

detaileddescription.para: Used when no grid file is available or readable.

briefdescription.para: Advance simulation time by dt seconds.

detaileddescription.para: Handles day rollover using a NO_LEAP calendar.

briefdescription.para: Abstract base class for all emulated E3SM components.

detaileddescription.para:
Provides the common infrastructure for emulator components including:
MPI communicator management
Grid data distribution and storage
Coupling data buffer management
Time stepping and state management
Logging infrastructure
Derived classes (e.g., EmulatorAtm) implement the pure virtual methods to provide component-specific behavior.

listitem.para: create_instance() - Initialize MPI and component metadata
set_grid_data() - Receive grid decomposition from driver
initialize() - Load model, read ICs, set up inference
run() - Execute time step (import → inference → export)
